title: Ahead of Midterms, Disinformation Is Even More Intractable
description: Ahead of the midterm elections, the proliferation of alternative social media sites has helped cement false and misleading information as a defining feature of American politics.
dc:creator: Steven Lee Myers and Sheera Frenkel
media:credit: Todd Anderson for The New York Times
media:description: Former President Donald J. Trumpâ€™s baseless claims of a stolen election have pulsed through public consciousness despite his banishment from platforms like Facebook and Twitter.
